TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Track extends System.Windows.FrameworkElement
.class public auto ansi Track extends System.Windows.FrameworkElement

summary.span: 表示一个处理 控件的定位和大小调整的控件基元和两个用于设置 的 控件。

span.span: Represents a control primitive that handles the positioning and sizing of a control and two controls that are used to set a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件没有默认值 。The control does not have a default . 它 作为和控件的一部分实现 。Its is implemented as part of the of the and controls. 具有一个 控件和两个 控件，用于更改 控件的属性 。The has a control and two controls that are used to change the property of the control. 下图显示了 滑块上的。The following illustration shows a on a slider. **滑块上的轨道****A Track on a Slider** ![RepeatButton、Thumb](~/add/media/trackonslider.png "RepeatButton、Thumb")![RepeatButton, Thumb](~/add/media/trackonslider.png "RepeatButton, Thumb") 下表显示了 它们自动绑定到的属性和相应的 属性。The following table shows the properties and the corresponding properties that they automatically bind to. 当任一属性发生更改时，绑定属性也会发生更改。When either property changes, the bound property also changes. | 属性 property| 属性 property| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| ||| ||| ||| 下表显示了作为 控件的一部分时，它们所绑定的属性和相应的属性 ，并且 属性没有显式设置。The following table shows the properties and the corresponding properties to which they bind when a is part of a control and the properties are not explicitly set. | 属性 property| 属性 property| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| ||| ||| 下表显示了作为 控件的一部分时，它们所绑定的属性和相应的属性 ，并且 属性没有显式设置。The following table shows the properties and the corresponding properties to which they bind when a is part of a control and the properties are not explicitly set. | 属性 property| 属性 property| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| ||| ||| 此外， 控件的控件属性 与 控件控件的属性绑定在一起 。Additionally, the properties for the controls for a control bind with the properties for the controls of the control. 当 使用滚动内容时，控件的大小与 显示在可查看区域或视区中的内容的百分比成正比。When a is used to scroll content, the size of the control is proportional to the percentage of the content that appears in the viewable area or viewport. 下图显示了 实现控件的控件的示例 。The following illustration shows an example of a control that implements a control. **具有轨道控件的滚动条****A ScrollBar that has a Track control** ![滚动条插图](~/add/media/scrollbargeneric.png "滚动条插图")![ScrollBar illustration](~/add/media/scrollbargeneric.png "ScrollBar illustration") 以下计算用于计算的大小 。The following calculation is used to compute the size of the . Scrollbar = (viewportSize/ (最小值 + viewportSize) # B3 x trackLengththumbSize = (viewportSize/(maximum-minimum+viewportSize))×trackLength ViewportSize 参数是属性的值 。The viewportSize parameter is the value of the property. 最大和最小参数与 和 属性值相对应。The maximum and minimum parameters correspond to the and property values. Expression 最大值 + viewportSize 的值是可滚动内容的大小。The value of the expression maximum-minimum+viewportSize is the size of the scrollable content. 请注意， 当内容滚动到底部时，属性的值表示的。Note that the value of the property represents the of the when the content is scrolled to the bottom. 此 值与内容的长度或范围不同。This value is not the same as the length or extent of the content. 有关更多详细说明，请参见。For a more detailed explanation, see . 中的的 从上 到下或从左到右增加，具体取决于的方向 。The of a in a increases from top to bottom or from left to right depending on the orientation of the . 同样， 中 a 的 会从下到上或从左到右增加，具体取决于的方向 。Similarly, the of a in a increases from bottom to top or from left to right depending on the orientation of the . 若要更改递增值的方向，请将 的属性设置 为 `true` 。To change the direction of increasing value, set the property of the to `true`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何 在中定义一个控件 。The following example shows how to define a control in a . [!code-xaml[ScrollBarTemplateExample#TrackDefinition](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ScrollBarTemplateExample/CS/Window1.xaml#trackdefinition)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过设置 、 和属性，可以指定的子元素 。You specify the child elements of a by setting the , , and properties. 子元素按设置属性的顺序进行索引。The child elements are indexed in the order that the properties are set.

span.span: The specified index is greater than the value of the property minus one (1).

summary.span: 获取或设置 的增加方向是否与默认方向反向。

value.span: 如果 和 交换位置并且值增加的方向反向，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the and the exchanged positions and the direction of increasing value is reversed; otherwise .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果的值 设置为，则 `true` 和中的和将 位于 交换位置。When the value of is set to `true`, the and the in the exchange places. 对于水平和控件，值从左到右递增 。 values increase from left to right for both horizontal and controls. 但是， 从上到下垂直增加的值，而垂直方向的值从 下到上增加。However, the values for a vertical increase from top to bottom, whereas for a vertical these values increase from bottom to top. 将 属性设置为时 `true` ，增加值的方向将反转。When you set the property to `true`, the direction of increasing value reverses. 如果将 作为控件的一部分实现 ，并且未显式设置 属性，则 属性将绑定到 属性。If you implement a as part of a control and you do not explicitly set the property, the property binds to the property. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示 当属性为时，如何在控件模板内定义属性 。The following example shows how the property is defined inside the control template when the property is . [!code-xaml[ScrollBarTemplateExample#RepeatButtonStyle](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ScrollBarTemplateExample/CS/Window1.xaml#repeatbuttonstyle)]

member this.Maximum : double with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 的最大可能的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum possible of the .
The largest allowable for the .
The default is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 控件位于控件中， 并且 未显式设置属性，则此属性会自动与 属性绑定。When a control is in a control and the property is not explicitly set, this property automatically binds with the property. 控件的值 等效于可滚动内容的大小减去可见内容区域或视区的大小。The value for a control is equivalent to the size of the scrollable content minus the size of the visible content area or viewport. 例如，如果内容的大小为100，并且属性的大小 为30，则属性的值 为70。For example, if the size of the content is 100 and the size of the property is 30, the value of the property is 70. 这是正确的，因为 控件的属性 对应于出现在视区顶部的可滚动内容中的位置。This is true because the property of the control corresponds to the position in the scrollable content that appears at the top of the viewport. 在此示例中，当内容滚动到最底部时，其中30% 的内容仍会显示在视区中。When the content is scrolled to the very bottom in this example, 30 percent of the content still appears in the viewport. 因此， 对应于视区顶部的是70， 值为70。Therefore, the that corresponds to the top of the viewport is 70, and the value is 70. 下图显示了与 控件中的位置相对应的 。The following illustration shows how the corresponds to a position in the of a control. ![对应于内容位置的值](~/add/media/scrollbarvalueeqmaximum.png "对应于内容位置的值")![Value corresponds to the position of the content](~/add/media/scrollbarvalueeqmaximum.png "Value corresponds to the position of the content") ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何为 成为属性的绑定源的设置的属性 。The following example shows how to set the property for a that becomes the binding source for the property.

summary.span: 获取用于更改 的 的 控件。

span.span: Gets the control that is used to change the of a .

value.span: 与 一起使用的 控件。

span.span: The control that is used with the .

value.span: 默认值为具有默认设置的 控件。

span.span: The default is a control that has default settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件的位置 对应于 控件的 。The placement of the control corresponds to the of the control. 控件中控件的大小 反映当前可见的内容量。The size of the control in a control reflects the amount of content that is currently visible. 的控件大小的 计算方式如下：The size of the control of the is computed in the following ways: - 如果 未指定该属性，则的大小 为固定的默认值。If the property is not specified, the size of the is a fixed default value. 这是 轨道函数在控件中的作用方式 。This is how the of a Track functions inside a control. - 如果 指定了属性并且内容的大小大于 ，则使用以下公式：If the property is specified and the size of the content is greater than the , the following formula is used: Scrollbar = TrackLength \* ViewportSize/ (最小值 + ViewportSize) ThumbSize = TrackLength \* ViewportSize / (Maximum - Minimum + ViewportSize) 其中的参数定义如下：Where the parameters are defined as follows: ||| |-|-| |ScrollbarThumbSize|控件的大小， 以与 TrackLength 相同的单位。The size of the control in the same units as the TrackLength.| |TrackLengthTrackLength|的长度 。The length of the .| |ViewportSizeViewportSize|显示在内容单位中的可滚动区域的大小，如文档的页数。The size of the scrollable area that is visible in the content units, such as the number of pages of a document.| |最大值Maximum|内容单位中内容的最大值，如10页文档的第10页。The maximum value of the content in content units, such as page 10 of a 10-page document.| |最小值Minimum|内容单位中内容的最小值，例如文档的第1页。The minimum value of the content in content units, such as page 1 of a document.| 下图显示了控件中其中一些参数的直观表示形式 。The following illustration shows a visual representation of some of these parameters in a control. ![视区大小、滚动块大小和跟踪长度](~/add/media/scrollbarthumbsizemath.png "视区大小、滚动块大小和跟踪长度")![Viewport size, thumb size, and track length](~/add/media/scrollbarthumbsizemath.png "Viewport size, thumb size, and track length") - 如果内容的大小小于 a ，则 不会显示，并且的 属性将 设置为 `false` 。If the size of the content is less than a , the does not appear and the property of is set to `false`. 控件的最小大小由 两个系统参数（和） 决定 。The minimum sizes for a control are determined by two system parameters, and . 垂直控件的最小大小 为 1/2 \* ，水平控件的最小大小为 1/2 \* 。The minimum size for a control in a vertical is 1/2 \* and the minimum size for a control in a horizontal is 1/2 \* . ## Examples 下面的示例演示在 属性为时，如何在中定义样式 。The following example shows how the style is defined inside the when the property is . [!code-xaml[ScrollBarTemplateExample#RepeatButtonStyle](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ScrollBarTemplateExample/CS/Window1.xaml#repeatbuttonstyle)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当不为时，属性的值用于计算 中控件的大小 。The value of the property is used to calculate the size of the control in a when the is not . 有关详细信息，请参阅属性的 "备注" 。For more information, see the remarks for the property. 若要显式定义的大小 ，请创建一个派生自类的对象， 并为和提供重写 。To explicitly define the size of the , create an object that derives from the class and provide overrides for and . 如果将 作为控件的一部分实现 ，并且未显式设置 属性，则 属性将绑定到 属性。If you implement a as part of a control and you do not explicitly set the property, the property binds to the property. 控件中实现的控件的属性值 始终为 ，因为 控件不更改大小。The value of the property of a control that is implemented in a control is always , because the control does not change size. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||
